name: Single Choice Set
description: Rapid-fire single choice questions with instant feedback and auto-progression. Ideal for quick drills, speed quizzes, and review sessions.

ai_input_format.description: AI should generate an object with a title and an array of questions. IMPORTANT: The first answer in each question's answers array must ALWAYS be the correct one. H5P shuffles them automatically.

questions.question: string - The question text
questions.answers: array of strings - Answer options (first is ALWAYS correct, 2-4 options). H5P will shuffle them.

questions.question: What organelle is known as the powerhouse of the cell?
What is the function of chloroplasts?
What controls what enters and exits the cell?
Where is DNA found in a eukaryotic cell?

choices.question: What organelle is known as the powerhouse of the cell?

conversion_notes.first_is_correct: First answer is ALWAYS the correct one - H5P handles shuffling
